text: Anna Trevisi (born 8 May 1992) is an Italian professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Women's WorldTeam . She won the junior road race at the 2010 European Road Championships. ==See also== * List of 2015 UCI Women's Teams and riders ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female cyclists Category:People from the Province of Reggio Emilia
title: Anna Trevisi
